Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Kedzie. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ellis/55th
ShortDescription: SB 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park  buses are temporarily rerouted via  Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, and 55th due to, street blockage near Ellis/55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park  buses are temporarily rerouted via  Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, and 55th due to, street blockage near Ellis/55th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
